named-query.name: OauthClientToken.findByClientTokenId
named-query.query: SELECT _client_token FROM OauthClientToken _client_token INNER JOIN _client_token.client _client WHERE _client.tokenId = :tokenId

named-query.name: OauthAccessToken.findByClientTokenId
named-query.query: SELECT _access_token FROM OauthAccessToken _access_token INNER JOIN _access_token.client _client WHERE _client.tokenId = :tokenId

named-query.name: OauthAccessToken.findByClientIdAndUsername
named-query.query: SELECT _access_token FROM OauthAccessToken _access_token INNER JOIN _access_token.client _client INNER JOIN _access_token.user _user WHERE _client.tokenId = :tokenId AND _user.username = :username
